alert.note: Alert for Pendleton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 20 at 4:32AM EDT until May 20 at 5:15AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM EDT FOR SOUTHERN CAMPBELL AND NORTHWESTERN PENDLETON COUNTIES... At 431 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Alexandria, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Highland Heights, Claryville, Silver Grove, Butler, Cold Spring, Ryland Heights, Crestview, Greenwood, Grants Lick, Aspen Grove, Gubser Mill, Peach Grove, Campbell County Lake and Catawba. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
